title: Unspeakable Words
description: 2nd EditionSpecial Agent John Flynn is everything Jerry Parker is dangerously handsome, coolly charismatic, and respected by his peers. Special Agent Parker is dedicated and meticulous, but his abrasive personality has given him a reputation for being difficult. When new information on a cold case appears, Parker is assigned to work with Flynn, and the sparks fly as their investigative styles clash. Contact with a strange artifact changes everything when it bestows unusual and unpredictable powers on Flynnâ€¦ and the two men must learn to trust each other before a killer strikes again.First Edition published by Dreamspinner Press, 2010.
author: Sarah Madison
